title: El Tren de Chocolate
description: A magical story about a chocolate train that arrives at the station, filled with delicious treats in each wagon. As children enjoy the sweets, the train gradually disappears until only the chocolate locomotive remains.

pages.title: The Chocolate Train Arrives
pages.description: A magical chocolate train arrives at the station

sentences.Un día llegó a la estación un tren hecho: One day a train made of chocolate arrived at the station.

pages.title: Hot Churros
pages.description: Children enjoy hot churros from the first wagon

sentences.En el primer vagón había churros calient: In the first wagon there were hot churros, and the children ate them.

pages.title: Hot Chocolate
pages.description: Children drink hot chocolate from the second wagon

sentences.En el segundo vagón había tazas de choco: In the second wagon there were cups of hot chocolate, and the children drank them.

pages.title: Nougat Bars
pages.description: Children break and taste nougat bars from the third wagon

sentences.En el tercer vagón había tabletas de tur: In the third wagon there were nougat bars, and the children broke them and tasted them.

pages.title: Sweet Cookies
pages.description: Children share sweet cookies from the fourth wagon

sentences.En el cuarto vagón había galletas dulces: In the fourth wagon there were sweet cookies, and the children shared them.

pages.title: Soft Cakes
pages.description: Children happily bite into soft cakes from the fifth wagon

sentences.En el quinto vagón había bizcochos suave: In the fifth wagon there were soft cakes, and the children bit into them happily.

pages.title: Colorful Candies
pages.description: Children keep colorful candies in their pockets from the sixth wagon

sentences.En el sexto vagón había caramelos de col: In the sixth wagon there were colorful candies, and the children kept them in their pockets.

pages.title: Empty Wagons
pages.description: Each wagon becomes empty and the train gets shorter

sentences.Cada vagón se quedaba vacío, y el tren e: Each wagon became empty, and the train grew a little shorter.

sentences.Al final solo quedó la locomotora de cho: In the end only the chocolate locomotive remained.

pages.title: The Train Disappears
pages.description: The locomotive releases cocoa steam and disappears into the sky

sentences.Con un silbido dulce, la locomotora solt: With a sweet whistle, the locomotive released cocoa steam and disappeared into the sky.
